name: Block'd (jpiolho, SaraFilipa)
description:
Block’d is our take on a Tetris style game with an instability component.

How to play:

Move and rotate blocks to make lines and score points while being attacked by random game glitches. Unlock power-ups as you go.

Block’d includes a global leaderboard. Try your best and see if you can make it. ;)

Thank you for playing! We hope you enjoy our game.

Credits:

JPiolho - Programming

SaraFilipa - Graphics

Screenshots:

This game was developed for Ludum Dare 49, with the theme "Unstable". 02.10 - 04.10.2021
